Rihanna Shares Cozy Pic with Chris Brown

snippet.title: CHRIS BROWN CONFIRMS RIHANNA BREAK UP
snippet.description:
CHRIS BROWN CONFIRMS RIHANNA BREAK UP
Toegevoegd door ClevverMusic laatste mei
http://bit.ly/ClevverMusic - Subscribe to ClevverMusic!http://Clevver.com - Visit our website! http://on.fb.me/loxDu6 - Facebook Fan Page!http://Twitter.com/ClevverMusic - Follow Us!Last week Chrianna showed signs of trouble in paradise, and now Chris Brown has confirmed his break up with singer Rihanna! You are watching ClevverMusic on YouTube- your source for music news. To refresh your memory, last week a male fan of Rihanna's posted kissy face pictures of the two at a club in New York. After that incident, Chris Brown released a track titled "I Can't Win," which talks about the ups and downs of a relationship. Breezy also unfollowed RiRi on Twitter and started following his ex Karreuche Tran. And now we know what it all means! All signs insinuated Chrihanna were no longer together, and has Chris confirmed that to be true. Chris declared the split in an interview with Austrailia's 2Day radio show "The Kyle and Jackie O Show." He also said RiRi would not be present at his birthday festivities which took place over the weekend. Breezy explained in the interview referring to his birthday, "Yeah, Imma do it solo," and then about the break up. "I mean, at the end of the day, shawty doing her thang, she on the road ... It's always gonna be love. I'm just gonna do me. I'm a grown man." He went on, "The way I look at it is, I am always going to love that person. I can't really be focused on wife-ing somebody that young. And I'm young too. So I can't focus on that right now." Umm does that mean the two were considering marriage? Sounds like it. But it also sounds like they decided they are too young for such a commitment and we commend them for that. Or perhaps the timing is just off. Rihanna is currently on her "Diamonds World Tour" meanwhile Chris is gearing up for his album "X" to drop this summer. Whatever the case, Breezy quickly found someone to replace Rihanna for his birthday festivities and it just so happened to be his ex Karrueche Tran. Sources confirmed she was by his side at his party at Mirage 1Oak nightclub in Las Vegas as well as his birthday party at the Emerson Theatre in LA on Friday. Do you think this is the end of Chrihanna for good—or will they get back together? Fire off your comments and remember to subscribe to our channel for more! Thanks for watching ClevverMusic, I'm Misty Kingma, see you next time.
15 718 views
